Text.Page:
Those disgusting {@LinkCreature:47#2003#argonomorph gulas} are still hanging around the {@Rgn:47003$$Bridgehead} in the {@Rgn:47001$$Tirkai Forest}. Also {@LinkCreature:47#1003#argonomorph mugatos} and {@LinkCreature:47#2002#argonomorph faeries}.

{@Creature:247#1002$$Salaine} at {@Rgn:47006$$Field Base Lunacy} wants them gone. Can you blame her?

Talk to her when it's done.
Just kill some {@LinkCreature:47#1003#argonomorph mugatos}, {@LinkCreature:47#2002#argonomorph faeries}, and {@LinkCreature:47#2003#argonomorph gulas}. Check back when you've done it.
